the hotel

rock sea week along the edges of the
fjo yd. 13 car encluding one tank

very nice person a Mrs Maxwell and
her brother Mr Clothier.She from BrynMahr.

little ferry- went across the water by aid of wire ropes.
We couldn 't get on But ti came directly ba ck for us.
